name: Java Courses
discripetion: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

name: Python Courses

name: PHP Courese
discripetion: The abbreviation PHP initially stood for Personal Homepage. But now it is a recursive acronym for Hypertext Preprocessor. It's recursive in the sense that the first word itself is an abbreviation, so the full meaning doesn't follow the abbreviation.

name: JavaScript Courses

name: Ruby Courses
